Question
========

The equivalence below is true for any value of $x$.

$$`r binom_prod` \equiv x^2+Bx+C$$

Find $B$ and $C$.

* $B=$ ##ANSWER1##
* $C=$ ##ANSWER2##

Answerlist
--------

`r al`
`r al`


Solution
========

FOIL!

$$`r binom_prod`~=~x^2+(`r q`)x+(`r p`)x+(`r p*q`)$$

Combine like terms.
